detail_desc: Boxer briefs in soft microfibre with an elasticated waist. The boxers are designed with a minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
Long polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Joggers in stretch supersoft denim with a ribbed elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, front and back pockets and elasticated hems.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with short raglan sleeves, decorative gathers at the neckline and buttons down the front.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet and an ankle-height shaft with reflective details. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long puff sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with a zip at the back, a gathered seam and satin tie belt at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.
Washed cotton twill trousers in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Tunic in crisp cotton poplin with a collar and V-neck opening at the front. Dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam under the bust and at the hem for added width.
Loose-fitting, V-neck T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Wide-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front, cap sleeves and a longer, sewn-in vest top with a racer back.

Set with a hooded top and trousers in printed sweatshirt fabric. Top with an unlined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
T-shirt in striped, airy linen jersey with a round neckline.

Ankle-length joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, discreet side pockets, flap leg pockets with a concealed press-stud, and gently tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Brushed inside.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a chest pocket, buttons down the front and a rounded hem.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. The tops of the thumb and index finger are in touchscreen-compatible material.
Slides in imitation suede with crossover straps. Imitation suede insoles and fluted soles.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with a wrapover front with ties at one side, and short sleeves.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and side pockets. Lined.
Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets, elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the sides of the hem. Lined.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams, elastication at the back of the waist and press-studs at the sides. Elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the foot, reflective details and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.

Straight-cut blouse in satin crêpe with a small stand-up collar with decorative appliqués. Opening with hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with cuffs and covered buttons.
Shorts in a softly draping viscose weave. High waist with pleats at the front and wide, covered elastication at the back, and diagonal side pockets.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and elbow patches in a contrasting colour.
Shirt in mulberry silk with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Dungaree shorts in washed stretch twill with adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Buttons at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft fine knit with an intarsia motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck blouse in an airy weave with short cap sleeves and decorative seams front and back. Slightly longer at the back.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Chinos in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Detachable, braided belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in soft, stretch denim with hard-worn details with patches on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details. Lightly padded cups with removable inserts, wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide, elasticated hem. Light support.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket, ribbing around the neckline and short slits in the sides.
5-pocket knee-length shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details and a text print on the coin and back pocket. Adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.

Fully lined swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the stomach and hips. V-neck, decorative gathers in the sides and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Cut-out sections front and back and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Large clutch bag in grained imitation leather with a flap with a metal decoration and concealed magnetic fastener. Narrow detachable metal chain shoulder strap and a sewn-in card holder with three compartments on the inside. Unlined. Size approx. 4x20x27 cm.
Trousers in a cotton weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a drawstring at the front. Zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and tapered legs.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere with a roll edge.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, patch front pockets and a back pocket.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Made using Lycra® Lastingfit technology to retain the shape of the jeans for a consistent fit.

Coat in imitation leather with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, welt side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined. The coat is PETA Approved Vegan-certified and meets PETA’s requirements for vegan products. This certification guarantees that the product is entirely free from materials and substances of animal origin. The polyurethane content of the coat is water-based and free from DMF.
Thong briefs in microfibre with lace sections, a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Shirt jacket in twill with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and flap chest pockets with a button. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. The zip has a chin guard. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of all-in-one suit is organic.
Shirt jacket in washed linen with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pockets and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Unlined.
Longer-style, fitted top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a collar, button placket and long sleeves.
Tailored trousers in a sturdy textured weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with double shoulder straps that cross at the back. Support panels and gathers for a draped effect at the top, and a seam under the bust. Jersey lining.
Comfort blankets in an airy cotton weave, one with an all-over print. Size 60x60 cm.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, visible button fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Suit trousers in a cotton and linen weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Small elasticated scrunchies in various designs.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Pyjamas in soft velour. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Wide bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Off-the-shoulder top in an airy weave with narrow shoulder straps, a flounce at the top and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Partly lined.
Fisherman’s hat in a cotton weave. Width of brim 8.5 cm.
Running vest top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Lightweight puffer jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jumpsuit in a soft viscose weave with a sheen. Collar, buttons down the front and cap sleeves with decorative ties. Smocked seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Warm-lined hat in woven fabric with earflaps, a turn-up peak and decorative ears at the top. Strap with a hook and loop fastening under the chin. Faux fur lining.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, discreet pockets in the side seams and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shorter, wide jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Multi-strand necklace of metal chains, two with pendants. Adjustable length 35-43 cm.
Shorts in woven fabric with decorative, shiny buttons at the front, a high waist and shaping darts at the back. Concealed zip in one side with a button at the top, and rounded hems.
Microfibre Brazilian briefs with laser-cut edges, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
